description:
Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow facilitate provision of privacy bay windows and external alterations including rearrangement and installation of openings to improve the residential amenity for future occupiers in relation to planning permission reference 194996FUL dated 02/10/2020 for 'Construction of 149 residential units (54 x 1 bed, 79 x 2 bed, 13 x 3 bed and 3 x 4 bed) ranging in height between one and four-storeys, with associated
hardstanding, car parking, landscaping and boundary treatment works.'
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title(s),

Biodiversity Enhancement Scheme-Version-6, ref: 4132,EC/BIOENHANCE/RF,KL/27-02-20/V6, prepared by Geosphere Environmental, dated 27.02.2020; Badger Survey, prepared by David Archer Associates, dated June 2018;
